title: Adidas Women's Alphaskin Sport Bra - Blue - Size L
description: The Adidas Women's Alphaskin Sport Bra in Blue is engineered for high-impact activities. The Alphaskin construction provides a locked-in feel, while moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry during your most intense workouts. The compression fit minimizes bounce, and the racerback design allows for a full range of motion. This sport bra is perfect for running, gym workouts, and other high-intensity sports. With its stylish design and functional features, it offers both performance and comfort.
key_features: Alphaskin construction for a locked-in feel
Moisture-wicking fabric to keep you cool and dry
Racerback design for full range of motion
meta_title: Adidas Women's Alphaskin Sport Bra - Blue - Size L
meta_description: Discover the Adidas Women's Alphaskin Sport Bra in Blue. Engineered for high-impact activities, featuring Alphaskin construction, moisture-wicking fabric, and a compression fit for support. Ideal for running and gym workouts. Size L available.
